info.name: BBY - Best Blue YouTube
info.description:
USE YOUTUBE DARK MODE! USE YOUTUBE DARK MODE! USE YOUTUBE DARK MODE!


Tired of seeing too bright blue themes? This theme will be for you! 
This theme has lots of blue, but it doesn't hurt eyes.
(atleast my eyes lol)

USE DARK MODE!

Always compatible!
Well, almost always...

Hey, if you want to contact me, please write in the comment section. I will talk there :)
info.additionalInfo: USE DARK MODE! â˜•Buy Me a Coffee If you want to support me (or you want to pay for new personal/public style, (10$). I understand that price may be a bit high, but it really takes a bit of time since YouTube is big). Note: If you wanna to use this theme, turn on dark theme on youtube. Note2: Found a bug? Report it to me on Discord! thelegendofwolf_ **Note2: Hey, if you wanna contact me please just write in comment section below. (i need to know who is adding me to friends)** MY ID (IMPORTANT IF I CHANGE TAG!: 353793401923305475, <@353793401923305475> Note3: I am not great coder, but this is my first time, when i release bigger style. v1.2: Small change for comments section. v1.2.1: Fixed "Post" button. v1.3: Added style for sponsoring, and add more style to live streaming v2.0: added style for voice searching, and more! v3.0: Fixed all bugs. Added logo color, fixed dot in sidebar color, added color to video settings ;D v3.2: YouTube logo is again blue. v3.3: changed licence to public domain because i dont know why the h*ll i had nocommercial noderivs. v3.4: added colors to tag's menu. And also for preview videos! Hope you like it v3.5: removed grey color from left menu (library, history, etc.) v3.6: better description of style v3.8: fixed grey color parts, added better scrollbar to adding to the playlist menu and sponsor menu v3.8.3: fixed sharing menu v3.8.4: fixed notification "ping" color v3.9: fixed subtitles, 8k, 4k, added color to subscribe button and other minor fixes THANK YOU GUYS FOR 1,1K DOWNLOADS <3 wow, nearly 2k downloads, thank you really much <3 v4.0: i fixed everything that i could found. Fixed: YouTube Shorts clicking animations for buttons fixed weird scaling of some menus. And other minor fixes! v4.1: added color to microphone searching, some fixes and i started making support for light mode users. v4.1.1: repaired sharing menu (youtube devs did some changes to it css) v.4.1.3: fixed playlist font. v4.1.5: fixed reporting menu v4.2: fixed disliking notification (yes, this exists) and one grey part of miniplayer v4.2.1: fixed notification that appears when you subscribe someone. v4.2.2: fixed subtitles bar. v4.2.3: removed weird bar in description section. v4.2.4: fixed description in youtube shorts v4.3.0: fixed titles in left side of toolbar. v4.3.5: i fixed live chat colors. I cant make all changes, since i dont have access to editor right now. v4.4: i removed new gradient from youtube update. i am sorry for that, but this completely ruined my theme. Oh, and i added some fixes :) v4.4.1: added some colors here and there, some fixes. v.4.5: fixes from new update v4.6: fixed preview menu from main page. v.4.6.2: fixed color in comunnity tab, added reminder to use dark mode :) v4.6.3: fixed lot of things, tried to fix live chat but still no progress. But i added some "decorations" to it. v4.6.4: small fix v4.6.5: small update, missing colors fixed. v.4.7: changed thumbnail to show more of my theme. (Thanks for 10k downloads <3) v4.8: Fixed searchbar, updated description v.4.9: I fixed the live chat displaying when there wasn't any livestream. v 4.9.2: Fixed cinematic glow (i think that's what it is called. Sadly i needed to block it completely from appearing. Although, it shouldn't impact you since you couldn't use it before since it would cause mismatch in colors. v 5.0: Fixed black color when turning on fullscreen, fixed scrollbars that youtube changed. Tried my best! Thanks for waiting! v 5.1: Deleted cinematic mode (again) since it ruins my mode, fixed colors for new display (youtube update), fixed small errors and i added some new ones.
